meanings.definition: A game played with rackets and a shuttlecock over a net.
meanings.sent1: We played badmintons in the backyard yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The school has a club for playing badmintons after classes.
meanings.sent3: During the picnic, we decided to have a friendly match of badmintons.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the shuttlecock hitting the rackets during badmintons echoed in the gym.
meanings.sent5: Her favorite sport to play with friends is badmintons.

meanings.definition: The equipment used in the game of badminton.
meanings.sent1: The store sells a variety of badmintons for players to choose from.
meanings.sent2: He carefully packed his badmintons in the bag before heading to the tournament.
meanings.sent3: The colorful badmintons caught the attention of the young players.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of badmintons was neatly organized on the shelf.
meanings.sent5: The coach provided new badmintons to the team for the upcoming match.

meanings.definition: The court on which badminton is played.
meanings.sent1: The badmintons court was well-maintained with fresh lines drawn.
meanings.sent2: Players warmed up by jogging around the badmintons court.
meanings.sent3: A squirrel unexpectedly ran across the badmintons court during the game.
meanings.sent4: The lights illuminated the badmintons court for the evening matches.
meanings.sent5: The championship finals were held on the grand badmintons court.
